mehidi krushi rasayanika drawya bhawithayedi athiwiya haki rogabadha, eewata pa්rathikarma, rogabadhawalin aarakshawime ka්ramaweda, palibodha hani ha eewa mardanaya karaganna ayuru, parisara paddhathiyata hani nowana ayurin awama krushi rasayanika bhawithaya, krushi rasayana niwaradiwa bhawitha karana ayuru, aarakshakari adum bhawithaya, aasanik adu wadi krushi rasayanika drawya hadunaganima yanadi kshetha්ra gananawak pilibadawa gowi pa්rajawa danuwath kirimata katayuthu kere.

sthanaya golfes pitiya we.mithurek sanwidhanaya kala natyayak nima wi pamina api maduwithen sappayam wimu.mithura atham wita oba asa thibennata puluwana.ada nithi wruththiye yedena ohu wipula prabhath hettiaarachchiya.ada witeka ohu mata bandhanagaraya thula di hamuwanne radawiyanta upadeshanaya sandaha pamina sitiyadiya.thawath mithurek wuye ewakata dematagoda dumriya sthanadhipathi wu saman ya.ma ohuge sampurna nama sihikara ganimata uthsaha daruwada mathakayata nonanginneya.

silayen shikshanayath, samadhiyen chiththekagrathawayak athi nam, pragnyawen, chathurarya sathya awabodha kala haki ya.silayen kama sampath pilibanda thada aashawa samanaya wana athara, samadhiyen aththakilamathanuyoga di sawadya prathipaththi pilibanda chinthawa baharawa nirwanagami prathipadawata sitha yomu weyi.wishwaye pera nowi wiru no asu mema dharmaya swayan chinthanayenma prathyakshayen dana ganimata tharam aadhyathmika shakthiyak aththe lowuthura budukenakuta pamanak bawa, manawa parapure ithihasaya anuwa pahadili weyi.
